alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:54PM CDT until July 02 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL SHERMAN AND DALLAM COUNTIES... At 453 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Conlen to 5 miles northwest of Ware to 5 miles south of Sedan, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Stratford, Texline, Ware and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
